member.name: P:DynamicLighting.LightingSpriteRenderer.VertexTranslucency
member.summary: [GET / SET] Specifies the objects translucency for Light when using vertex lighting. A very translucent object (1.0) is affected from Lights behind it as well as from Lights in front of it. Non-translucent objects (0.0) are only affected by Lights in front of them.

member.name: T:DynamicLighting.Light
member.summary: A source of light. Supported light types are directional, ambient, point and spot. To create directional or ambient lights, add this Component to a GameObject without Transform.

member.name: P:DynamicLighting.Light.Direction
member.summary: [GET / SET] The direction this Light points to. Used in spot and directional light. Set this to zero in order to create a point light.

member.name: P:DynamicLighting.Light.AmbientColor
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Lights ambient color value. Ambient light is used as base value in directional lighting.

member.name: P:DynamicLighting.Light.AmbientIntensity
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Lights ambient intensity. Ambient light is used as base value in directional lighting.

member.name: P:DynamicLighting.Light.Range
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Lights range. Only applies to point and spot lights.

member.name: P:DynamicLighting.Light.SpotFocus
member.summary: [GET / SET] The Lights spot focus. The higher this value is, the smaller the spot radius.

member.name: T:DynamicLighting.DynamicLightingCorePlugin
member.summary: Defines the dynamic lighting core plugin.
